content.question: Which of the following will cause a movement along the demand curve for chicken, a normal good, resulting in an increase in the quantity demanded?

choices.label: An increase in the price of fish, a substitute good
An increase in the price of barbecue sauce, a complementary good
A decrease in the price of chicken
A decrease in the number of consumers of chicken

content.answer: A decrease in the price of chicken

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
